title: [Bug] TodoApp.list() default parameter show_all=True is inconsistent with CLI --pending flag behavior
summary: Changed TodoApp.list() default parameter from show_all=True to show_all=False for more intuitive API behavior
tests_run: uv run ruff check src/flywheel/cli.py tests/...
risks: Breaking change: TodoApp.list() now returns only pending todos by default instead of all todos
Existing code relying on old default behavior will need to explicitly pass show_all=True
limitations: CLI behavior remains unchanged (list shows all todos by default, --pending shows only pending)
acceptance_criteria_met: CLI list command without flags shows all todos (both pending and done)
CLI list command with --pending flag shows only pending todos
TodoApp.list() API is now internally consistent with intuitive defaults
implementation_notes: Minimal fix - changed only the default parameter value. Updated 2 existing tests that relied on old behavior.
